channel.title: os on Developer Playground
channel.description: Recent content in os on Developer Playground

item.title: Installing and using CentOS 6.10 via Docker
item.description: Pulling and run image in general docker run -it --name cos centos:6.10 bash with sharing filesystem docker run -it -v /host/dir:/container/dir --name cos centos:6.10 bash with binding container ports to the host

item.title: Installing and using Ubuntu 18.04 via Docker
item.description: Pulling and run image in general docker run -it --name ubt ubuntu:18.04 bash with sharing filesystem docker run -it -v /host/dir:/container/dir --name ubt ubuntu:18.04 bash with binding container ports to the host
